title: [Caligos Isle, Beach Scarp]
description: Here at the high water line of the berm crest, generally safe from any waves except the rogues pushed inward during severe storms, a line of torch-holds set with flaming torches mark off safety from danger.  Lighter, dry dark grey sand meets the edge of wet black sand just beyond here, indicating the height of the current tide.

Here at the high water line of the berm crest, generally safe from any waves except the rogues pushed inward during severe storms, a line of empty iron torch-holds mark off safety from danger.  Lighter, dry dark grey sand meets the edge of wet black sand just beyond here, indicating the height of the current tide.
